casebody.data:
State
v.
Chad Braxton Bumpers 239P16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 24, 2016

Sterling Rozear, Attorney at Law, For Bumpers, Chad Braxton.

Allison A. Angell, Joseph L. Hyde, Assistant Attorney Generals, Michael D. Waters, District Attorney, For State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 23rd of June 2016 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 24th of June 2016."
